TopicTitle: What are the must need mods for 1.12.3?

Articles.Content:
Ok so im looking for mods that make it look good, also help, but does not go to overpowerful (like idk, 100 -150 mods). +DLCS. Cause for some reason, I want a mod when im in game/forget a mod so please help!

Also your UI scale please.

Edited June 2, 2022 by Kerbalyer
UI Scale added.
Near Future Technologies, Scatterer, EVE, Waterfall, TURD are the staples of my install
Extraplanetary Launchpads, some life support mods, simple logistics, SSPXR
